title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.1 - Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.1 - Procedures

State Regulations

The provisions of Part 621 of this Title apply to permit
modifications for institutional control except as indicated herein. Section
383-3.12
of this Part does not
apply to permit modifications for institutional control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
